categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Grundorsen Maelo was a male trooper of the Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. In 3636 BBY he was stationed on Ziost when former Sith Emperor Vitiate came to the world and possessed many of the Imperials on the planet, turning them into his puppets to murder civilians. Grundorsen Maelo was among those who fell under his control and he was killed during the fighting in New Adasta.
Grundorsen Maelo was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan in game update 3.2. Killing his is required to obtain an achievement.
